name: "Project Spells"
description:
Project Spells attempts to take the classic but often stale turn-based combat system and combine it with a word-forming minigame to determine attack and defence values and add an element of skill to the gameplay. 

With each letter being worth 1-3 damage, it's up to the player to combine creating longer words with tactically choosing the most valuable letters to best their foes!

Project Spells is still currently a work in progress so any and all feedback would be greatly appreciated as we continue to try and improve the game.
